metadata.title: CVE-2019-15767 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
In GNU Chess 6.2.5, there is a stack-based buffer overflow in the cmd_load function in frontend/cmd.cc via a crafted chess position in an EPD file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-15767` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

gnuchess - 6.2.7-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gnuchess package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.2.7-1').
